definitions.title: n.pr.mont. Pisgah
definitions.body: (prob. cleft, fr. a natural feature of mt.; Dr:De 3:17);—alw. ´[[הַפּ]]: ´[[ראׂשׁ הַפּ]] Nu 21:20, Nu 23:14, De 3:27, De 34:1; ´[[אַשְׁדּׂת הַפּ]] De 3:17, De 4:49, Jos 12:3, Jos 13:20; mt. in Moab, on NE. shore of Dead Sea, exact loc. unknown (cf. Fešḫa as a cliff on NW. shore, v. Di:Nu 21, 20); Fasga De 3:17 + , t laceuth/n. De 4:49, Aelaceume/nou Nu 21:20 +.
